Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to classifying credit card processing fees and bank fees as exempt expenditures
Items.MatterName: Classifying credit card processing fees and bank fees as exempt expenditures.

Items.Title: Oversight - Improving Voter Turnout in Municipal Elections
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Improving Voter Turnout in Municipal Elections

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the voters to approve, an amendment to the New York State Constitution to move New York City elections to even-numbered years to coincide with Gubernatorial elections.
Items.MatterName: Amendment to the New York State Constitution to move New York City elections to even-numbered years to coincide with Gubernatorial elections.
